H0.text: in which country bikram sambhat the official calender. India

H3.text: in which country bikram sambhat the official calender. Nepal

A4.text: Vikram Samvat is an official calendar of Nepal.

A5.text: In India, the reformulated Saka calendar is officially used (except for computing dates of the traditional festivals).
